prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that floats and has a mischievous grin.
I want a spooky Pokemon design inspired by classic horror themes and shadows.
Generate a creature that embodies the essence of fear, with dark colors and floating features.
Make a ghostly Pokemon that can disappear into smoke and has glowing eyes.
Imagine a ghost-type Pokemon that lurks in dark places, with a round and puffy appearance.
Design a haunting Pokemon with a playful personality, surrounded by a misty aura.
Show me a ghost Pokemon that combines cuteness with a chilling presence.
